channel.title: How do i disable trade? plz help
channel.description:
how do i disable trade on my [b] delta based [/b] server? plz tell! or tell me a command thx!
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 14, 2009, 01:57:39 am[/size][hr]or atleast disable 2nd trade screen?

item.title: How do i disable trade? plz help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Apparently he wants to remove trading altogether. So he should remove all code that has to do with trading.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i disable trade? plz help

item.title: How do i disable trade? plz help
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

add stuff like this:

case 128: //Trade Request
if(tradeoff == 0) {
WanneTradeWith = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
WanneTrade = 1;
} else {
sendMessage("trade disabled.");
}
break;[/code]

[code]case 139: //Trade answer
if(tradeoff == 0) {
WanneTradeWith = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
WanneTrade = 2;
} else {
sendMessage("trade disabled.");
}
break;

something like thatâ€¦

Read full topic
item.source: How do i disable trade? plz help

item.title: How do i disable trade? plz help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Get rid of the code that handles the trading packets (128 and 139).
